product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? The men's REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) Long Underwear Bottoms move moisture away from your skin and dry fast so you can stay and play longer. Polartec Power Dry uses 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. The combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. Soft, non-chafing flatseam construction. Brushed elastic waistband. 20 UPF sun protection. The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms have a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
